resources.string:
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random te
xt.It has roots in a piece of classica There are many variations of passages o f Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some f
orm, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If
 you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn
 t anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum gene
rators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first tr
ue generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a han
dful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated L
orem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc. l Latin literat 
 ure from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
